sentences.en: 82% of voters are dissatisfied with the way their country is being governed.
sentences.cn: 82%的选民对本国的治理方式不满意。

sentences.en: And so it was his turn to be dissatisfied with life.
sentences.cn: 现在该轮到他对生活感到不满了.

sentences.en: But Artaud was increasingly dissatisfied with film as a medium.
sentences.cn: 但是阿尔托对电影这种表现方式越来越不满。

sentences.en: Dissatisfied customers can return the product for a full refund.
sentences.cn: 顾客如不满意可以全额退货。

sentences.en: He became still more dissatisfied with it and secretly did everything in his power to obstruct it.
sentences.cn: 他对此更不满意,尽在暗里使绊子.

sentences.en: He felt restless and dissatisfied as he drove home.
sentences.cn: 在开车回家的途中，他感到烦躁不安，很不高兴。

sentences.en: He seemed dissatisfied with my explanation.
sentences.cn: 他似乎对我的解释不满意.

sentences.en: I have tried to write this story five times but I am still dissatisfied with me.
sentences.cn: 我已经把这个故事写了五遍了,可是我还是不满意.

sentences.en: I hinted that I was dissatisfied with his work.
sentences.cn: 我暗示我对他的工作不满意.

sentences.en: I must do this work again because I am dissatisfied with it.
sentences.cn: 我得重新做这件工作,因为我对它不满意.

sentences.en: I overheard them say they were dissatisfied.
sentences.cn: 我偶然听到他们说,他们不满意.

sentences.en: I'm very dissatisfied with him because he's slipping backward day by day.
sentences.cn: 我很不满意他,因为他的思想一天一天地回到旧的路上去了.

sentences.en: If you are dissatisfied with our service, please write to the manager.
sentences.cn: 对我们的服务如有不满，请函告经理。

sentences.en: The director, Ron Howard, was dissatisfied with Nicole's response even after several retakes.
sentences.cn: 虽然重拍了好几次，导演罗恩·霍华德仍然对妮科尔的表现不满意。

sentences.en: There was a dissatisfied look in the magager's eyes.
sentences.cn: 经理的眼睛里露出不满的神色.

trans.tran_cn: 感到不满的，不满意的，不高兴的，显出不满的
trans.tran_en: not satisfied because something is not as good as you had expected
